about.bio_p1: Backend engineer who cares about clean architecture, security, and building tools that work well. I spend most of my time writing Java, Go, and TypeScript â€” usually with a terminal open and a strong opinion about indentation.
about.bio_p2: When I'm not writing code, I'm probably reading about distributed systems, tinkering with Linux configs, or going down a security rabbit hole. This site is where I document what I learn.
